mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE user_email = #{userEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (user_pw, user_name, user_birth, user_gender, user_phonenum, user_signup, user_img_url, refund_account_number, user_email) VALUES (#{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userGender}, #{userPhonenum}, CURRENT_DATE, #{userImgUrl}, #{refundAccountNumber}, #{userEmail})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET user_name = #{userName}, user_phonenum = #{userPhonenum}, user_birth = #{userBirth}, user_gender = #{userGender}, user_img_url = #{userImgUrl} WHERE user_email = #{userEmail}
